info.name: YouTube Early 2018 Material Layout
info.description: This userstyle brings back the late 2017 - early 2018 YouTube material layout.
info.additionalInfo:
Apart from this subreddit link: https://www.reddit.com/r/oldyoutubelayout/comments/vwokjo/i_made_a_project_for_late_2017_early_2018/

These scripts and styles are required to install:
https://pastebin.com/GSTffbL7 - YT material pre-August 2018 script
https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/443297-replace-explore-with-trending
https://github.com/YukisCoffee/yt-anti-shorts
https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/447194-watch9-reconstruct
https://www.returnyoutubedislike.com/install
https://userstyles.world/style/2174/colourful-youtube-ratings-with-return-youtube-dislike-extension

for like colour: #167ac6
for dislike colour: #cccccc

Note: If you are using dark theme, Just change the div.style-scope.ytd-watch-flexy's background-color to: #121212

Update history:
Version 1.0.0 - Intinal Release.
Version 1.0.1 - Changed the search button to max-width and max-height and fixes the watch player white backgrounds.
Version 1.0.2 - Minor fixes (including compact buttons on watch)
Version 1.1.0 - Fixed watch player transparent backgrounds on watched mode.
Version 1.2.0 - Fixed watch player transparent backgrounds again (so it will be truly black), Updated ytd-guide-entry-renderer.style-scope CSS and removed Podcasts button in the sidebar.
Version 1.2.1 - Removed Downloads button in the sidebar.
